author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Early Access Launch Trailer for Mycopunk, an action sci-fi co-op shooter developed by Pigeons at Play. Players will become a part of the New Atlas Hazard Crew and venture out to rid the galaxy of a deadly fungal menace. Utilize advanced futuristic weaponry to take on missions across the cosmos alone or with friends to upgrade weapons, acquire powerful abilities, and discover long-lost secrets. Mycopunk is available now in Early Access for PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mycopunk - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get ready to dust off your VR goggles for another VRUpload Showcase on July 11th at 10am PT. The best games in the virtual world will be on full display as the showcase dives into more titles than ever before. 

#IGN
title: Upload VR Showcase Summer 2025

author: IGN
description:
Astro Bot just got a brand-new free update featuring five challenging new levels and a set of highly requested bots for fans to rescue – including characters that have never appeared in the game before. In this video, we show off the two brand new bots that fans have been begging for! All footage was captured on PS5 Pro in 4K at 60fps.

00:00 - High Inflation
01:24 - Bot 1 Gatcha Lab
01:41 - Bot 1 Crash Site
02:08 - Megamix Mastery
04:45 - Bot 2 Gatcha Lab
05:02 - Bot 2 Crash Site

#IGN #Gaming
title: Astro Bot Update Finally Delivers Two Long-Awaited Cameos | PS5 Pro 4K 60FPS Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for Long Live My Lady!, a tavern management simulation game developed by sudo eat cake. Players will embody a gnome tasked with facilitating sales, tending to the patrons, and keeping the only tavern in the Dungeon afloat. Long Live My Lady! is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Long Live My Lady! - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Ghost of Yotei trailer for the upcoming action adventure game, and take a look at the PlayStation 5 (PS5) console - Ghost of Yotei Limited Edition bundles, featuring hardware and accessories inspired by the game. Ghost of Yotei will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5) on October 2, 2025. The PS5 console - Ghost of Yotei Limited Edition bundles will also be available on October 2, 2025.

These bundles include a PS5 console with Limited Edition console covers, a Limited Edition DualSense wireless controller, a voucher for a digital copy of the game, and pre-order incentive items. The Ghost of Yotei accessories can also be purchased separately, including the DualSense Wireless Controllers - Ghost of Yōtei Limited Edition and Ghost of Yōtei Gold Limited Edition Console Covers for PS5 (Compatible with PS5 consoles (CFI-2000 model group - slim) with or without a disc drive) and PS5 Pro consoles (Compatible with PS5 Pro consoles with or without a disc drive.)
title: Ghost of Yōtei - Official Limited Edition PS5 Bundles & Accessories Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at State of Play Gameplay Deep Dive for Ghost of Yotei, the next installment in the third-person action-adventure franchise developed by Sucker Punch Productions. Players can catch nearly 20 minutes of the upcoming PlayStation exclusive presented by Sucker Punch’s Creative Directors, Jason Connell and Nate Fox. Ghost of Yotei takes the experience of Ghost of Tsushima to new heights with new weapons, customization options, special modes, and more as the new protagonist Atsu journeys across the edge of Japan for the ultimate quest for vengeance. 


The latest Ghost of Yotei-centric State of Play details gameplay, story, and more as Atsu takes on the Yotei 6 after they murder her family and propel her motivations forward. Players will be able to explore Ezo at their own pace, whether they choose to focus on combat, story, or taking in the sights. Interrogate enemies along the way to find new points of interest, quests, and more. As players progress, Atsu's legend of being an
title: Ghost of Yōtei - Official Gameplay Deep Dive | State of Play

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Home Menu Overview Trailer for Nintendo Switch 2, the latest Nintendo console developed by Nintendo. The Home Menu is the center of the entire Nintendo Switch 2 experience, where players can load games, engage with GameChat, shop on the Nintendo eShop, tweak settings, and more. Interface with the Home Menu on the Nintendo Switch 2, available now.

#IGN #Gaming #NintendoSwitch2
title: Nintendo Switch 2 - Official Home Menu Overview Trailer

description: Presented by @audible - Discover audiobooks, podcasts & originals that deliver edge-of-your-seat thrills. There’s more to imagine when you listen.
title: Nathan Fillion plays a "jerk" well as Guy Gardner in Superman! #superman #movie #greenlantern #ign

author: IGN
description:
Not everything that’s rotten here is fish. Tour the Fish Market stage in this latest Shinobi: Art of Vengeance trailer for the upcoming action platformer game. The new Shinobi: Art of Vengeance trailer shows gameplay and enemies you'll encounter in this stage. Shinobi: Art of Vengeance will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Nintendo Switch, Xbox, and Steam on August 29, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance - Official Fish Market Stage Introduction Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Heroes in a Half Shell are making their way to the UniVersus collectible card game! The TMNT Booster Set features over 180 cards, 15 playable characters, and 8 ultra-rare Chrome Rares, each capturing the style, energy, and grit of the beloved TMNT universe. With new mechanics, flavorful references, and powerful interactions, the set is a perfect fusion of nostalgia and strategic gameplay.
Alongside the booster set, a ready-to-play Starter Deck will give new and returning players an easy entry point into UniVersus. The deck comes fully loaded with a 60-card list, a character card, a learn-to-play guide, and a paper playmat—everything needed to jump right into the action. The full TMNT set releases August 15!
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles x UniVersus - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Need some survival safety tips as you dive into the dangerous world of Firebreak? Learn about threshold breaches and exogenic mass in this Firebreak Auxiliary Safety Training trailer for FBC: Firebreak, a 3-player cooperative first-person shooter set within the enigmatic Federal Bureau of Control (FBC). In FBC: Firebreak, as the Bureau’s headquarters faces a deadly and prolonged siege by otherworldly forces, only Firebreak—its most adaptable response unit—has the skills and courage to restore order. 

FBC: Firebreak is available now on PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store), Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).

Check out the trailer's official description, which describes the dangers of the color pink as you explore the Oldest House in FBC: Firebreak. "Pink is a wondrous color, a joyous one even! But deep in the Research Sector of the Oldest House, it's a color that's synonymous with fear. Get covered in this pink exogenous mass and you could meet an explosive end. The Firebreak In
title: FBC: Firebreak - Official Surviving the Workplace: Frequency Shift Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Water Magician is available now on Crunchyroll! 

Reincarnation had Ryo dreaming of peace, but instead he lands into a monster-infested wilderness. With water magic and eternal youth, he survives countless wicked concoctions for 20 years, becoming one of the most powerful magicians ever. Ryo’s fate shifts when he meets Abel, a genius knight, thrusting him into magical society’s spotlight. Thus, the Water Magician’s wild adventure begins!
title: The Water Magician - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Vex Gameplay Overview Trailer for Borderlands 4, the next game in the hit first-person action looter shooter franchise developed by Gearbox. Get the rundown on one of the playable Vault Hunters named Vex, a powerful Siren who can use ranged attacks, summon clones to join the fight, and unleash her trusty Siren animal to aid in combat. Play as Vex in Borderlands 4, launching on September 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming #Borderlands4
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Vex Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Vex 'Purple Friday' Character Story Trailer for Borderlands 4, the upcoming installment to the legendary first-person action looter shooter developed by Gearbox. Players can become acquainted with Vex, one of the playable characters of Borderlands 4, as a Purple Friday event sets her on a course to become a true Vault Hunter. Borderlands 4 is launching on September 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming #Borderlands4
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Vex 'Purple Friday' Character Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
HOTEL INHUMANS is available now on Crunchyroll! 

The best hotels must meet certain standards, including the finest cuisine, ways to relax, and entertainment. Of course, they also need the best selection of weapons, reliable ways to falsify one’s identity, and ways to dispose of evidence. In this hotel at the border of death stand two concierges, Ikuro Hoshi and Sara Haizaki. What kinds of requests will the assassins have for them next?
title: Hotel Inhumans - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Takopi’s Original Sin is available now Crunchyroll!

A Happy alien, Takopi, lands on Earth with one mission: to spread happiness! When he meets Shizuka, a lonely fourth grader, he vows to bring back her smile using his magical Happy Gadgets. But as he uncovers the pain in her life, Takopi learns that true happiness may require more than gadgets.
title: Takopi's Original Sin - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Join the expedition to save our planet’s most endangered species. Watch as the team spots a silverback gorilla in this exclusive clip from The Wild Ones, an upcoming Apple TV+ documentary series featuring Aldo Kane (former Royal Marines Commando and expedition leader), Declan Burley (wildlife and camera trap expert), and Vianet Djenguet (ecological storyteller and wildlife cinematographer). The Wild Ones premieres on July 11, 2025 on Apple TV+.

In The Wild Ones, explore hidden corners of Earth with a trio of experts as they try to save six endangered species from extinction. With crafty camerawork and survival skills, the team race to find, record, and protect these elusive creatures before it’s too late.
title: The Wild Ones - Exclusive "First Gorilla" Clip (2025)

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Release Date Trailer for Heartworm, a retro-inspired survival horror game developed by Vincent Adinolfi. Players will endure a world as Sam, where memories and mourning blur the lines between reality and supernatural visions. Solve mind-bending puzzles armed with a camera at the ready, to truly face what scares Sam the most with optional tank controls, PSX-style visuals, and retro effects. Heartworm is launching on July 31 for PC (Steam).
title: Heartworm - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Season 14 Trailer for King of the Hill, the hit animated comedy series distributed by Hulu. The trials, tribulations, and shenanigans of Hank Hill continue when Season 14 of King of the Hill premieres on Monday, August 4, on Hulu and Hulu on Disney+.

After years working a propane job in Saudi Arabia to earn their retirement nest egg, Hank and Peggy Hill return to a changed Arlen, Texas to reconnect with old friends Dale, Boomhauer and Bill. Meanwhile, Bobby is living his dream as a chef in Dallas and enjoying his 20s with his former classmates Connie, Joseph, and Chane.

King of the Hill Season 14 stars Mike Judge, Kathy Najimy, Pamela Adlon, Johnny Hardwick, Stephen Root, Lauren Tom, and Toby Huss. The series is executive produced by original co-creators Mike Judge and Greg Daniels, as well as incoming executive producer and showrunner Saladin Patterson.

King of the Hill Season 14 premieres on Monday, August 4, on Hulu and Hulu on Disney+.
title: King of the Hill - Official Season 14 Trailer (2025) Mike Judge, Kathy Najimy, Pamela Adlon

author: IGN
description:
Enjoy Karl Urban and Jeffrey Dean Morgan not being able to get through a scene in this exclusive gag reel from The Boys, Season 4, coming to DVD and Blu-ray on August 19, 2025.

#IGN
title: The Boys: Season 4 - Exclusive Gag Reel (2025) Karl Urban, Jeffrey Dean Morgan

author: IGN
description:
Desperate to save her sister, Abby (Ella Balinska) takes a dangerous job in the remote Georgian wilderness. Stranded in the mountains after her helicopter crashes, she finds hope through John (Rob Delaney), a mysterious helper radioing from nearby. 

As he guides her through the harsh conditions, Abby struggles to survive, and her grip on reality falters until she is faced with an impossible choice.

Distributed by DECAL, The Occupant will be available theatrically in select cities and on VOD on August 8, 2025.
title: The Occupant - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Ella Balinska, Rob Delaney

author: IGN
description:
Outlander: Blood of my Blood is a romantic saga that unfolds across time. From the battlefields of World War I to the rugged Highlands of 18th century Scotland, two fated couples must defy the forces that seek to tear them apart, intersecting in surprising and unforeseen ways.

After 11 years of epic romance on the groundbreaking series Outlander, the timeless tale continues -- or rather begins -- on the eve of an earlier Jacobite rebellion. A prequel to Outlander, the series explores the lives and relationships of two couples as they fight against all odds to be together: the parents of Outlander’s Claire Randall -- Julia Moriston (Hermione Corfield) and Henry Beauchamp (Jeremy Irvine); and those of Outlander’s Jamie Fraser -- Ellen MacKenzie (Harriet Slater) and Brian Fraser (Jamie Roy). 

In addition to Corfield, Irvine, Slater, and Roy, Outlander: Blood of my Blood stars Tony Curran as Simon Fraser, Lord Lovat, Séamus McLean Ross as Colum MacKenzie, Sam Retford as Dougal MacKenzie
title: Outlander: Blood of my Blood - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Superman Cinematic Trailer for Fortnite, the hit third-person battle royale game developed by Epic Games. Players can embody the Man of Steel as Superman as the lead hero for Season 3. Wield the Superman Call and attain Superman’s Flight, Heat Vision, and Super Punch to turn the tide of battle. Superman is launching into Fortnite with Season 3 on July 11.

#Fortnite #Superman #IGN
title: Fortnite - Official Superman Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Shark Dentist is exactly what it sounds like: you are a shark dentist who must perform dental work on anaesthetized sharks, but if you mess up, they might wake up in pain and rip your head off. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3423280/Shark_Dentist

#IGN #Gaming
title: Shark Dentist - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the ARK: Aquatica teaser trailer unveiling the release date for this upcoming DLC. Ark: Aquatica will tell a non-canonical mythical story, expanding the ARK universe into new dimensions of survival. ARK: Aquatica will be available on July 15, 2025.

#ARKAquatica #Gaming #IGN
title: ARK: Aquatica - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Writer/Director Sakamoto Yugo (A Janitor) and action director Sonomura Kensuke (Ghost Killer), along with the baby assassins themselves -- Akari Takaishi (Ghost Killer) and Saori Izawa (A Janitor) -- are together again for the most exciting and dangerous chapter in the Baby Assassins saga to date when Baby Assassins 3 blasts onto on Digital and Blu-ray August 26 from Well Go USA Entertainment. 

They laugh, they cry, they kill; but the baby assassins have never faced an enemy this dangerous. A brutal freelance killer has got them in his sights and he’s not giving up until someone dies. Formerly titled Baby Assassins: Nice Days, Baby Assassins 3 also stars Sôsuke Ikematsu (The Last Samurai), Atsuko Maeda (Shin Godzilla), Atomu Mizuishi (Baby Assassins franchise), Tomo Nakai (Sayonara, Girls.), Tsubasa Tobinaga, plus the feature films debuts of Mondo Otani, Kaibashira, karma, and Mr. Bunny.

#IGN #Movies
title: Baby Assassins 3 - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Akari Takaishi, Saori Izawa

author: IGN
description:
Following last week’s devastating Xbox layoffs, Perfect Dark has become one of the most high-profile casualties. We break down new developer comments about the 2023 gameplay demo, Was as it really “fake,” or actually in-engine? Plus, more fallout and updates from Xbox’s massive layoffs.

For all the latest news and discussion around the always-busy and always-changing world of Xbox, be sure to check out Unlocked. It’s IGN’s weekly Xbox show, hosted by Ryan McCaffrey, Miranda Sanchez, and Michael Higham. New episodes of Unlocked drop every Thursday on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever you get your shows, with full video versions on IGN.com and YouTube. Unlocked is produced by IGN, and part of the Geek Media podcast network.

#ign #xbox #gaming
title: Breaking Down the Aftermath of Xbox’s Massive Layoffs - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Control Group Warbond Trailer for Helldivers 2, the hit third-person co-op shooter developed by Arrowhead Studios. Players can soon gain access to the Control Group Warbond fitted with overclocked weapons, prototype armour, and gear of bleeding edge justice. Take up arms with the VG-70 Variable Primary Weapon, the PLAS-45 EPOCH Stratagem, the G-31 ARC Throwable, and more to defend against the unholy machinations. The Control Group Warbond for Helldivers 2 is launching on July 27 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

#Helldivers2 #ControlGroupWarbond #IGN
title: Helldivers 2 - Official Control Group Warbond Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Fate Trigger is a 3D Anime-style, hero-based tactical shooter powered by Unreal Engine 5. Dive into a dynamic world of floating islands, become a sharpshooter with extraordinary special skills, craft your own strategies, and engage in thrilling, spectacular life-or-death showdowns!

Add Fate Trigger to your Steam Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3092530/Fate_Trigger/

Presented by Fate Trigger
title: Fate Trigger - Official Closed Beta Trailer
